nodes.text: The L1-L Defender was a type of small battle droid available during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. It was used by the Gree on numerous planets, including Ilum.
The L1-L Defender appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a pet. It is one of the possible rewards for defeating bosses during the Relics of the Gree event.
